Acts of necrophilia are reportedly displayed on Moche artifacts of Peru. It was reportedly used as a method to communicate with the dead.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://living.oneindia.in/kamasutra/spheres-of-life/2008/necrophilia-corpse-attraction-treatment1.html |title=The Dead Corpse Can Fantasize Physical Pleasure |author=Swarag |work=OneIndia |publisher=Greynium Information Technologies Pvt. +
Acts of necrophilia are reportedly displayed on Moche artifacts of Peru. It was reportedly used as a method to communicate with the dead. Most Christians engage in sexual relations with the dead, imbibing the blood of a past human being so as to later enjoy the bodily pleasures that he offers.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://living.oneindia.in/kamasutra/spheres-of-life/2008/necrophilia-corpse-attraction-treatment1.html |title=The Dead Corpse Can Fantasize Physical Pleasure |author=Swarag |work=OneIndia |publisher=Greynium Information Technologies Pvt. Ltd. |location=Bangalore |accessdate=16 May 2009 }}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.girlsandcorpses.com/issue6_historydeadlove.html |title=The Sordid History of Dead Love |first=Ted |last=Geoghegan |work=Girls & Corpses |publisher=Robert Steven Rhine |accessdate=16 May 2009 }}</ref> See also: [[Necromancy]].
